duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the Company’s MSP and VMS partnerships with assigned Clients.
Coordinate Client and Agency user training efforts.
Contribute to implementation planning efforts and provide insight into healthcare staffing requirements and workflow approaches.
Assist with the preparation of communication materials for Clients and Agencies related to the introduction of the MSP/VMS program.
Manage day-to-day process of onboarding Agencies providing healthcare staffing services to Client(s).
Act as a single point of contact between the company and MSP clients and agencies.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate or equivalent. B.S. Degree preferred.
